import cv2
from matplotlib import pyplot as plt
source.108b1745:
gray = cv2.cvtColor(img, cv2.COLOR_BGR2GRAY)
plt.imshow(gray)
plt.title('Gray Lena')
plt.imshow(gray, cmap="gray", vmin=0, vmax=255)
